SELECT BOARD_NO,ZONE_NAME,BOARD_WRITER,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT ,COUNT,FILE_PATH ,INFO_HOMEPAGE,INFO_CALL FROM BOARD B JOIN THEME USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN ZONE Z ON (Z.ZONE_NO = B.ZONE_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN INFO USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 1 AND THEME_NO = 3 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
